hero_description: Daleel is your personal space to save and organize the links that matter. Never lose an important link again.

features.heading: Why choose
features.links_title: All your links in one place
features.links_desc: No more losing links in chats.
features.fast_desc: Access your links in seconds with our intuitive interface.
features.secure_desc: Your links stay safe and accessible only to you.

step1.title: Create your account
step1.description: Sign up in seconds and get started immediately.

step2.title: Save your links
step2.description: Add links with one click from anywhere.

step3.title: Organize & find easily
step3.description: Use folders, tags, or search to stay in control.

cta.heading: Ready to Take Control of Your Links?
cta.description: Organize, save, and access your links effortlessly. Keep them safe forever.
